repl_description:
Technical optimization project for a TypeScript/JavaScript application, featuring a React-based frontend with comprehensive health status monitoring capabilities. The application implements continuous performance monitoring through server-side metrics collection and client-side display components, with real-time updates every 5 seconds.

Key technologies and features:
- TypeScript/JavaScript
- React with React Query
- Server-side metrics collection middleware
- Client-side metrics display components
- Health monitoring endpoints
- API performance testing suite
- Real-time metrics updates (5s intervals)
- ESLint with TypeScript/React rules
- Prettier code formatting
- Husky pre-commit hooks
- Jest testing framework
- Automated code quality gates
